webSkills.titleWeb: One code block at a time
webSkills.textBE: C#, ASP.Net Core: Enhance my expertise in C# and ASP.Net Core to develop secure, scalable, and reusable backend applications.
webSkills.textDB: SQL Server: Master SQL Server to design and manage databases efficiently and ensure data integrity.
webSkills.textAzure: Cloud Services: Leverage Azure's powerful capabilities in infrastructure management, application performance enhancement, and cloud-native development to build robust applications.
webSkills.textFE: React: Create highly responsive and reusable components to build interactive user interfaces.
webSkills.textVue: Vue.js: Explore the capabilities of Vue.js to understand its advantages and integrate it into projects where applicable.
webSkills.textCMS: Umbraco: Expand my skills in Umbraco CMS to efficiently manage and deploy dynamic web content.
webSkills.textGoal: The only obstacle is time, so strategic planning and focused efforts will be essential to achieve these goals.

graphicSkills.textPS: Photoshop: Continuously discovering new techniques and refining my skills to create visually stunning designs.
graphicSkills.textAI: Illustrator: Bringing ideas to life through vector art and design.
graphicSkills.textID: InDesign: Crafting visually compelling layouts for print and digital media, focusing on typography, composition, and visual storytelling.
graphicSkills.textUX/UI: UX / UI: Deepening my understanding of usability, interaction design, and creating intuitive, user-centered experiences that bridge the gap between functionality and aesthetics.
graphicSkills.textGoal: To achieve my design goals in 2025, a balance between creativity and structure is required, where each project becomes a step toward refining my skills and creating meaningful, visual experiences.

otherSkills.otherSkillsDrivingTitle: Driving License: Category B and access to own car
